Andrew Wilson wrote:

> I have posted 3 files to Files/grouptest which I would like to offer
> for submission to JUnit.

I hate to burst your bubble, but code is essentially never accepted into 
JUnit. It's open source in name only.

<snip />

> For example, I have a Server that runs 500 similar tests, without my
> classes I would need 500 test methods (unless anyone knows a better
> way).

I haven't looked at your stuff, but I invite you to compare it to 
existing solutions. Google "Parameterized Test Case," or, if you have 
the patience, search the archive of this group.

Take care.
